articles.description: Amazon’s Echo Show 5 smart display usually costs $90, but Best Buy’s deal includes a second one at no extra charge. Additionally, Marshall’s Major III Bluetooth headphones are $50, and Razer has a new deal on PC gaming accessories.
articles.content:
$90 gets you two displays to keep for your home or to share with friends and family
